dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2460 IH: Eliminating the RFS and Its Destructive Outcomes Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Perry (for himself, Mr. Brecheen, and Mr. McClintock) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal the renewable fuel program of the Environmental Protection Agency.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eliminating the RFS and Its Destructive Outcomes Act.

subsection.text: Section 211(o) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)) is repealed.

paragraph.text: Section 211(d) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(d)) is amended—

clause.text: by striking (n), or (o) each place it appears and inserting or (n); and
by striking (m), or (o) and inserting or (m); and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking (n), and (o) each place it appears and inserting and (n).

paragraph.text: Section 107(a)(1)(B) of the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act (15 U.S.C. 2807(a)(1)(B)) is amended by inserting , as in effect on the day before the date of enactment of the Eliminating the RFS and Its Destructive Outcomes Act after (40 CFR, part 80).
